A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is terrific family fun like any Star Wars film should be. It's a great addition to the saga\, and plays very well in terms of tone\, humor\, and action right after Return of the Jedi and The Force Awakens. It left me wondering where this saga will go next. All of the haters need to reexamine what made the original trilogy great\, because Disney film or not\, this new movie managed to capture it all\, and play out a new important chapter following The Force Awakens.
